abstract: Citigroup‘s consumer operations have lost nearly half of their senior management in the last 18 months, The Financial Times reported. Several of these high-level employees have left for J.P. Morgan Chase, while three others joined Brysam Global Partners, a private equity firm co-founded by Bob Willumstad, a former chief operating officer at Citi.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup‘s consumer operations have lost nearly half of their senior management in the last 18 months, The Financial Times reported. Several of these high-level employees have left for J.P. Morgan Chase, while three others joined Brysam Global Partners, a private equity firm co-founded by Bob Willumstad, a former chief operating officer at Citi.

headline.main: Citi’s Consumer Arm Loses Senior Managers
